name: natural-cure
caption: Natural Cure

effect.short: Cures any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} upon switching out.
effect.full:
This Pokémon is cured of any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} when it is switched out for another Pokémon.

If this ability is acquired during battle, the Pokémon is cured upon leaving battle before losing the temporary ability.

flavorText:
All status conditions heal when the Pokémon
switches out.
